p:
The first case diagnosed in USA on 20 January 2020 was a young male patient who had travelled to Wuhan, China. He never visited the Wuhan market or any healthcare facility, and also had no contact with ill people while in the city. The USAâ€™s patient zero initially presented with mild symptoms, but progressed to pneumonia on day nine. His laboratory results showed leucopaenia, mild thrombocytopaenia, elevated creatinine and liver enzymes (alkaline phosphatase [ALP], alanine transferase [ALT], aspartate transferase [AST]).
